entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @BorisJohnson we know that you tested positif and hospitalised for weeks, why don't you share treatment to save more lives? weekes ago you were publically saying that you have covid-19 but why are you not sharing the cure? we all know that you cannot kill a virus and it stays in your body.
